jexer

Class THScroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • jexer.TWidget
      • jexer.THScroller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<TWidget>

    public class THScroller
extends TWidget
    THScroller implements a simple horizontal scroll bar.

    • Constructor Summary
